I donâ€™t know if anybody has brought this up already but when you clone a field group that contains fields with display conditions, these conditions remain as they are instead of referring to the new field group variables.

So if I have a group with a choice field and then 10 different fields that display depending on which choice you made, and I want to clone that group, I need to update the display options for each of the 10 cloned fields to refer to the new choice field clone.
Thanks for reporting this Shamash! Definitely an oversight on our part, I'm going to open an issue for this and have someone from our team take a look
Anyone else having issues where content added to the "Additional Markup before </body>" does not actually get added to the template?

Hey AJ - yes this is on purpose that we strip any HTML that does not have text content in the rich text editor. I'd recommend putting this code into a custom module instead since even if we did not strip this out for rich text it would be an invisible icon when editing rich text content
Also just FYI there is now an icon field available for custom modules! It uses fontawesome as well
